> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/289?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [45ea141...a1a8275](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/289?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).
I don't fully understand the issue. Is this a temporary change to work around a poetry bug, or the recommended way going forward?

It's what the poetry maintainers recommend: https://github.com/python-poetry/poetry/issues/1975#issuecomment-693619643 and they will be explicitly splitting out `poetry-core` in the next release of poetry is my understanding.
